author: joeyaiello
body: I was asked by the rest of the @PowerShell/powershell-committee and @AngelCalvo to add a link to our `README.md` to the [PowerShell-RFC](https://github.com/powershell/powershell-rfc) for better visibility. If anyone has feedback on my language, feel free to leave it here.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@joeyaiello**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Joey Aiello). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: KirkMunro
comments.body: @joeyaiello Isn't RFC short for "Request for Comments" and not "Review for Comment"?

title: Add PowerShell-RFC link to README
